sentences.text: March 16, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Grainger Shareholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 annual meeting of shareholders of W.W. Grainger, Inc. will be held at our headquarters located at 100 Grainger Parkway, Lake Forest, Illinois 60045 see map overleaf), on Wednesday, April 26, 2017, at 10 A.M. (CDT).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the meeting, we will report on our operations and other matters of current interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders will also vote on the matters set forth in the accompanying Notice of Annual Meeting and Proxy Statement and any other matters properly brought before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors and management cordially invite you to attend.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please take the time to carefully read the Notice of Annual Meeting and Proxy Statement that follow.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you plan to attend the meeting, please ensure that your shares are represented by giving us your proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can do so by telephone, by Internet, or by signing and dating the enclosed proxy form and returning it promptly in the envelope provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We look forward to seeing you at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: /s/ D.G. MACPHERSON
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: /s/ J. T. RYAN
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: James T. Ryan Chairman of the Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: D.G. Macpherson Chief Executive Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: YOUR VOTE IS IMPORTANT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A majority of the outstanding shares entitled to vote on a matter must be represented either in person or by proxy to constitute a quorum for consideration of that matter at the annual meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held by a broker, unless you provide specific voting instructions, your broker will not be able to vote your shares for the election of directors, on the advisory votes related to executive compensation or on other non-routine matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please make sure your shares are voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS TO BE HELD
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APRIL 26, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Grainger Shareholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 annual meeting of shareholders of W.W. Grainger, Inc. will be held at our headquarters at 100 Grainger Parkway, Lake Forest, Illinois 60045 (see map on previous page), on April 26, 2017, at 10 A.M. (CDT) for the following purposes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. to elect 10 directors for the ensuing year;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. to consider and act upon a proposal to ratify the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as independent auditor for the year ending December 31, 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. to consider and hold an advisory vote on the compensation of Grainger's Named Executive Officers;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. to consider and hold an advisory vote on the frequency of the advisory vote on the compensation of Grainger's Named Executive Officers; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. to transact such other business as may properly come before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has fixed the close of business on March 6, 2017, as the record date for determining shareholders entitled to vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders may vote either in person or by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By order of the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Hugo Dubovoy, Jr.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Secretary Lake Forest, Illinois March 16, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING THE AVAILABILITY OF PROXY MATERIALS FOR THE ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS TO BE HELD ON APRIL 26, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Grainger's Proxy Statement and Annual Report on Form 10-K are available in the 2017 Annual Shareholder Meeting/Proxy Information section of Grainger's website at http://www.grainger.com/investor and also may be obtained free of charge on written request to the Corporate Secretary at Grainger's headquarters, 100 Grainger Parkway, Lake Forest, Illinois 60045-5201.

sentences.text: Introduction
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the purpose of this proxy statement?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement relates to the 2017 annual meeting of shareholders of W.W. Grainger, Inc., an Illinois corporation (Grainger or the Company) to be held on April 26, 2017, and any adjournment of that meeting to a later date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It contains information intended to help you make your voting decisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are sending this proxy statement to you because Grainger's Board of Directors is soliciting your proxy to vote your shares at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement and other proxy-soliciting materials were first sent or made available to shareholders on or about March 16, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What matters are scheduled to be presented at the 2017 annual meeting of shareholders?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The election of 10 directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A proposal to ratify the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as Grainger's independent auditor for the year ending December 31, 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A proposal to consider and hold an advisory vote on the compensation of Grainger's Named Executive Officers; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A proposal to consider and hold an advisory vote on the frequency of the advisory vote on the compensation of Grainger's Named Executive Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who is entitled to vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of shares of common stock outstanding on Grainger's books at the close of business on March 6, 2017, the record date for the meeting, may vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There were 58,719,653 shares of common stock outstanding on that date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If my shares are held in street name can my broker vote for me?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless you have given specific voting instructions to your broker, your broker cannot vote your shares on the election of directors, on the advisory votes related to executive compensation, or on any non-routine matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the difference between holding shares as "shareholder of record" and as "beneficial owner"?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered directly in your name with Grainger's transfer agent, Computershare Trust Company, N.A., you are the shareholder of record with respect to those shares and you have the right to instruct us directly how to vote your shares or to vote in person at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in street name by a brokerage firm, bank, or other nominee, you are the beneficial owner of the shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your nominee is required to vote your shares according to your direction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not instruct your nominee how you want your shares voted, your shares cannot be voted for the election of directors, on the advisory vote on the compensation of Grainger's Named Executive Officers or on the frequency of the advisory vote on the compensation of Grainger's Named Executive Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please contact your brokerage firm, bank, or other nominee with instructions to vote your shares for the election of directors and on other matters to be considered at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2   W.W. GRAINGER, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes do I have?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You have the right to cumulative voting in the election of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This means that you have a number of votes in the election equal to the number of shares you own multiplied by the number of directors being elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can cast those votes for the nominees as you choose.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, you may cast all your votes for one nominee or you may apportion your votes among two or more nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In any matter other than the election of directors, each of your shares is entitled to one vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Does Grainger have majority voting for the election of directors with a resignation policy for directors failing to receive the required majority vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As required under Illinois law, directors are elected by the votes of a majority of the shares represented in person or by proxy at the meeting and entitled to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Moreover, in accordance with the Company's Criteria for Membership on the Board of Directors, any director standing for re-election (including the 10 nominees standing for election at the annual meeting) who fails to receive the required majority vote is expected to tender his or her resignation for consideration by the Board Affairs and Nominating Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board Affairs and Nominating Committee will consider the resignation and make a recommendation to the Board of Directors concerning the acceptance or rejection of the resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board will then take formal action on the Board Affairs and Nominating Committee's recommendation within 90 days after the results of the director election at the annual meeting are certified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following the Board's decision on the Board Affairs and Nominating Committee's recommendation, the Company will publicly disclose the Board's decision.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What voting standard applies to the ratification of the appointment of the independent auditor?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ratification of the appointment of the independent auditor requires the affirmative votes of a majority of the shares represented in person or by proxy at the meeting and entitled to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What voting standard applies to the advisory vote on the compensation of the Named Executive Officers?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although the shareholders' vote is advisory and therefore non-binding, the vote on the compensation of the Named Executive OfficersGrainger's six highest paid officers whose compensation is discussed in the Compensation Discussion and Analysis section of this proxy statementis determined by the votes of a majority of the shares represented in person or by proxy at the meeting and entitled to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What voting standard applies to select the frequency of the advisory vote on the compensation of the Named Executive Officers?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a majority of the votes are not cast for one of the options for the frequency of the advisory vote (one year, two years, or three years), the Board of Directors will consider the option that receives the highest number of votes cast as the shareholders' preferred choice; however, this vote is advisory only and is not binding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How frequently does Grainger conduct an advisory vote on the compensation of its Named Executive Officers?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has determined to hold an advisory vote on the compensation of the Named Executive Officers (Say on Pay) at every annual meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders have the opportunity to cast an advisory vote on the frequency of Say on Pay votes at least every six years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There will be an advisory vote on the frequency of the Say on Pay vote at this year's annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Assuming that shareholders vote to approve annual Say on Pay advisory votes, the next advisory vote to approve the compensation of the Named Executive Officers will occur at the 2018 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The next advisory vote on the frequency of the Say on Pay vote following this year's annual meeting will occur at Grainger's 2023 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 PROXY STATEMENT   W.W. GRAINGER, INC.

sentences.text: What if I don't indicate my voting choices?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If Grainger receives your proxy in time to permit its use at the meeting, your shares will be voted in accordance with the instructions you indicate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If we have received your proxy and you have not indicated otherwise, your shares will be voted as recommended by Grainger's Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specifically, your shares will be voted, either individually or cumulatively:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the election of the director nominees;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the proposal to ratify the appointment of the independent auditor;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the approval of the advisory resolution on the compensation of Grainger's Named Executive Officers; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR ONE YEAR as the frequency for shareholder advisory votes on the compensation of Grainger's Named Executive Offic
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner and the shares you own are held in street name by a brokerage firm, bank, or other nominee you must specifically instruct your nominee how you want your shares voted for the election of directors, on the advisory resolution on the compensation of Grainger's Named Executive Officers, and on the frequency of the shareholder advisory votes on the compensation of Grainger's Named Executive Officers; otherwise your nominee is not allowed to vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please contact your brokerage firm, bank, or other nominee with instructions to vote your shares for the election of directors and on other matters to be considered at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How does discretionary voting apply?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Grainger is not aware of any matter not described in this proxy statement that will be presented for consideration at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If another matter is properly presented, your shares will be voted on the matter in accordance with the judgment of the person or persons voting the proxy unless your proxy withholds discretionary authority.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: May I revoke my proxy?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may revoke your proxy at any time before the voting at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can do so in one of the following ways:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. Deliver to Grainger's Corporate Secretary timely written notice that you are revoking your proxy; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. Provide to Grainger another proxy with a later date (which can be done by telephone, by Internet, or by signing, dating, and returning a proxy form); or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. Vote in person at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What does it mean if I receive more than one set of proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Receiving multiple sets of proxy-soliciting materials generally means that your Grainger shares are held in different names or in different accounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You must sign, date and return all proxy forms to ensure that all of your shares are voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What constitutes a quorum at the meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A majority of the outstanding shares entitled to vote on a matter, whether present in person or by proxy, constitutes a quorum for consideration of that matter at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A quorum is necessary for valid action to be taken on the matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your shares will be present by proxy and count toward the quorum if you give us your proxy by telephone, by Internet, or by signing, dating, and returning a proxy form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Describe what types of shareholder engagement occurred in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Grainger has a very expansive shareholder engagement process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We hosted our annual investor day in November with more than 90 investors and analysts in attendance and several
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4   W.W. GRAINGER, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: hundred listening via webcast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we presented at 11 investor conferences and met with 500 unique firms and more than 850 unique investors in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our investor outreach includes both existing and potential shareholders and we ensure that we meet with at least 80% of our largest investors each year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also met with 90% of our top 15 investors, excluding index and exchange traded funds, between January and April prior to our 2016 annual meeting of shareholders to answer their questions regarding Company strategy, results, governance, executive compensation and other topics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We plan to follow a similar practice in 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, management, including our Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer, actively engages with investors throughout the year, in addition to the Investor Relations team.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who pays the costs of soliciting proxies?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Grainger will pay all the costs of soliciting management proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Brokerage firms, custodians, nominees, fiduciaries, and other intermediaries are being asked to forward the proxy-soliciting materials to beneficial owners of Grainger common stock and to obtain their authority to give proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Grainger will reimburse these intermediaries for their reasonable expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to mailing proxy-soliciting materials, Grainger's directors, officers, and regular employees may solicit proxies personally, by telephone, or by other means.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They will not receive additional compensation for these services, other than normal overtime pay, if applicable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives of Grainger's transfer agent may also solicit proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Grainger additionally has employed D.F. King & Co., Inc. to help solicit proxies and will pay that firm approximately $7,000 for ts services, plus reasonable costs and expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where can I find the voting results?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will report the voting results on a Form 8-K within four business days after the end of our annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the deadline for receipt of shareholder proposals for inclusion in the 2018 annual meeting proxy statement?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A shareholder who intends to present a proposal at the next annual meeting of shareholders and who wishes the proposal to be included in our proxy materials for that meeting pursuant to Rule 14a-8 under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (Exchange Act), must submit the proposal in writing to the Corporate Secretary at the address on the notice of annual meeting accompanying this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proposal must be received by Grainger no later than November 16, 2017, and must comply with the applicable SEC rules and other requirements prescribed in our by-laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the procedure for nomination of directors at the 2018 annual meeting of shareholders using Grainger's proxy access by-laws?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A qualifying shareholder, or a group of up to 20 qualifying shareholders, owning 3% or more of the Company's outstanding shares of common stock continuously for at least three years may nominate and include in Grainger's proxy statement and proxy card qualifying director nominees constituting up to the greater of two directors or 20% of the directors then serving on the Board, provided that the shareholder(s) and nominee(s) satisfy the requirements specified in our by-laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the procedure for other nominations of directors or proposals to transact business at the 2018 annual meeting of shareholders?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A shareholder entitled to vote for the election of directors at an annual meeting and who is a shareholder of record on:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the record date for that annual meeting,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the date the shareholder provides timely notice to Grainger, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the date of the annual meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 PROXY STATEMENT   W.W. GRAINGER, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: may directly nominate persons for director, or make proposals of other business to be brought before the annual meeting, by providing proper timely written notice to the Corporate Secretary at the address on the notice of annual meeting accompanying this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our by-laws require that written notice of proposals intended to be presented by a shareholder at the next annual meeting, but that are not intended for inclusion in our proxy statement for that meeting pursuant to Rule 14a-8 of the Exchange Act, be delivered no earlier than December 27, 2017, and no later than January 26, 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our by-laws also require that written notice of nominees for the election of directors intended to be made by a shareholder at the next annual meeting be delivered by no later than the date with respect to submission of shareholder proposals under Rule 14a-8 of the Exchange Act as set forth in the proxy statement for the preceding annual meeting of shareholders, which in this case is November 16, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be in proper written form, these notices must include certain information required by our by-laws, including information about the shareholder, any beneficial owner on whose behalf the nomination or proposal is being made, their respective affiliates or associates or others acting in concert with them, and any proposed director nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A copy of our by-laws is available in the Governance section of Grainger's website at www.grainger.com/investor or may be obtained free of charge on written request to the Corporate Secretary at the address on the notice of annual meeting accompanying this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6   W.W. GRAINGER, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board Affairs and Nominating Committee recommends candidates for Board membership based on a number of criteria, including ethical standards, judgment, independence and objectivity, strategic perspective, record of accomplishment, business knowledge and experience applicable to Grainger's goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Suggestions as to candidates are received from members of the Board Affairs and Nominating Committee, other directors, employees, search firms and others, including shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any shareholder who would like the Board Affairs and Nominating Committee to consider a candidate for Board membership should send a letter of recommendation containing the name and address of the proposing shareholder and of the proposed candidate and setting forth the business, professional, and educational background of the proposed candidate, as well as a description of any agreement or relationship between the proposing shareholder and proposed candidate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A written consent of the proposed candidate to being identified as a nominee and to serve as a director if elected must also be provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The communication should be sent by mail or other delivery service to the attention of the Corporate Secretary at Grainger's headquarters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has adopted "categorical standards" to assist it in making independence determinations of nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The categorical standards are intended to help the Board in determining whether certain relationships between nominees and Grainger are "material relationships" for purposes of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) independence standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The categorical standards adopted by the Board have more restrictive thresholds than the NYSE's bright line revenue test for non-independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The categorical standards adopted by the Board are set forth in Appendix A to this proxy statement and are also available in the Governance section of Grainger's website at www.grainger.com/investor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the ordinary course of its operations during 2016, Grainger engaged in various types of transactions with organizations with which Grainger directors are associated in their principal business occupations or otherwise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specifically, in the ordinary course of its business during 2016, Grainger bought products and/or services from, or sold products and/or services to, companies with which Messrs. Santi and Slavik are or were associated as executive officers or otherwise as of December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In no instance did the total amount of the purchases from or sales to any such company during 2016 represent more than 0.241% of the projected consolidated gross revenues of that company for the year or more than 0.325% of the consolidated gross revenues of Grainger for the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, as part of its overall 2016 charitable contributions program, Grainger made donations to tax-exempt organizations with which Messrs. Novich and Santi serve as officers, directors or trustees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In no instance did the total amount of the contributions to such an organization during 2016 represent more than 0.0526% of that organization's projected total receipts for the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board considered these transactions and donations in assessing the independence of the directors involved against the NYSE's independence standards and Grainger's categorical standards, and determined that none of the directors had any direct or indirect material interest in the transactions and donations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Similar transactions and donations are likely to occur in the future, and are not expected to impair the independence of the directors involved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 PROXY STATEMENT   W.W. GRAINGER, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that each of Messrs. Adkins, Anderson, Levenick, Novich, Roberts, Santi, and Slavik, and Ms. Hailey has no material relationship with Grainger within the meaning of the NYSE independence standards and Grainger's categorical standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The other nominees, Messrs. Ryan and Macpherson, are Grainger employees and, accordingly, are not considered "independent."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Rogers, who is not standing for re-election at the annual meeting, has also been determined by the Board to have no material relationship with Grainger within the meaning of the NYSE independence standards and Grainger's categorical standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Election of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Grainger's directors are elected each year at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As set forth in the Operating Principles for the Board of Directors, Grainger expects all directors and nominees to attend annual meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the 2016 annual meeting, all of the persons serving as directors at the time were in attendance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, all directors attended at least 75% of Board and Committee meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ten directors, all current Board members, have been nominated by the Board for election at this year's annual meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While Gary L. Rogers is also a current Board member, he will not be standing for re-election this year in accordance with the Company's Criteria for Membership on the Board of Directors, which provide that an outside director generally will not be nominated after the age of 72.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All directors are elected for a one-year term.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each director will therefore serve until the 2018 annual meeting of shareholders or until his or her successor has been qualified and elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Details concerning the nominees are provided below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As required under Illinois law, majority voting applies to all Grainger director elections.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, directors are elected by the votes of a majority of the shares of Grainger common stock represented in person or by proxy at the meeting and entitled to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A shareholder directing to withhold authority for re- election of a director will have the same effect as votes against the election of that director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Assuming a quorum is present, broker non-votes will not affect the outcome of the vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any of the nominees for director mentioned below should be unavailable for election, a circumstance that is not expected, the person or persons voting your proxy may exercise discretion to vote for a substitute nominee selected by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominees and Director Experience, Qualifications, Attributes, and Skills
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The nominees have provided the following information about themselves, including their ages as of March 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each nominee has provided information on his or her relevant background that includes the nominee's experience for at least the past five years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Grainger's directors and nominees have varied experience, qualifications, attributes, and skills that assist them in providing guidance and oversight to Grainger's management as it operates the business through a network of highly integrated distribution centers, websites and branches and with more than 25,600 employees in the United States, Canada, Europe, Asia, and Latin America.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With 2016 sales of $10.1 billion and as a broad line distributor of maintenance, repair and operating (MRO) supplies and other related products and services used by businesses and institutions primarily in the United States and Canada, with a presence also in Europe, Asia and Latin America, Grainger has a diverse customer base necessitating depth and breadth of product lines and offerings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has identified experience, qualifications, attributes, and skills that in light of Grainger's business, structure and challenges are relevant to service on the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board considers nominees who have demonstrated integrity and accomplishment in their business and professional careers and who possess the necessary experience, qualifications, attributes, and skills to contribute to the Board and Grainger.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, ongoing director education, whether provided by Grainger or by a third party, is important to service on the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Current nominees have engaged in continuing education and other programs to remain current in their particular areas of expertise as well as to further their understanding of corporate governance and in other matters relevant to Grainger.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 8   W.W. GRAINGER, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes the experience, qualifications, attributes, and skills of each nominee qualify the nominee for service on the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the current nominees has significant leadership experience in large, multifaceted organizations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This experience includes developing and executing corporate strategy, overseeing operations, and managing risks in organizations similar in size or complexity to Grainger.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The summary provided below is not a comprehensive statement of each nominee's background but is provided to describe the primary experience, qualifications, attributes, and skills that led the Board to nominate each individual.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rodney C. Adkins
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rodney C. Adkins, age 58, is President of 3RAM Group LLC, a privately held company specializing in capital investments, business consulting services and property management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Formerly, Mr. Adkins was Senior Vice President of International Business Machines Corporation (IBM), a leading manufacturer of information technologies, having served in that position from 2007 until 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In his over 30-year career with IBM, Mr. Adkins held a number of development and management roles, including Senior Vice President of Corporate Strategy from 2013 to 2014, Senior Vice President of Systems and Technology Group from 2009 to 2013, Senior Vice President of Development & Manufacturing from 2007 to 2009, and Vice President of Development of IBM Systems and Technology Group from 2003 to 2007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is also a director of Avnet, Inc., where he serves on its audit committee, PPL Corporation, where he serves on its audit committee, and United Parcel Service, Inc., where he chairs the risk committee and is a member of the compensation committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Adkins was also a director of Pitney Bowes Inc. from 2007 to 2013, where he served on its audit committee and executive compensation committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Adkins, an independent director, was first appointed a director of Grainger in Ju member of the Compensation Committee and a member of the Board Affairs and Nominating Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Qualifications
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Adkins served as the senior vice president of a global information technology and innovation-focused public company and held senior positions responsible for development, management and strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Over the course of 30 years with this company, he developed deep product development and brand management experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also gained significant experience managing and understanding corporate finance, financial statements and accounting through his many operational roles with the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, Mr. Adkins managed the company's supply chain and procurement, giving him direct insight into global trade and supply chains, and the role of distributors in those efforts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Adkins has extensive experience in corporate governance matters and is a director at three other public companies, in addition to Grainger, and serves on the audit committee of two of them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Brian P. Anderson
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Brian P. Anderson, age 66, is the former Executive Vice President of Finance and Chief Financial Officer of OfficeMax Incorporated, a distributor of business-to-business and retail office products, having served in that position until January 2005.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to assuming this position in 2004, Mr. Anderson was Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Baxter International Inc., a position he assumed in 1998.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is also a director of James Hardie Industries plc where he chairs the audit committee and serves on the remuneration committee, PulteGroup, Inc. where he chairs the audit committee and serves on the nominating and governance committee, and Stericycle, Inc. where he serves on the audit committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is a director and Chairman of The Nemours Foundation, a non-profit children's health organization, and a member of the Governing Board of the Center for Audit Quality's (CAQ) Governing Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Anderson was also a director of A.M.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Castle & Co. from 2005 to 2016, where he served as Chairman of the Board and Chairman of its audit committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Anderson, an independent director, was first elected a director of Grainger in 1999 and is a member of the Audit Committee, an "audit committee financial expert," and a member of the Board Affairs and Nominating Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Qualifications
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Anderson served as the chief financial officer of two public companies, held finance positions including corporate controller and vice president of audit and was an audit partner at an international public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, Mr. Anderson has in-depth knowledge of accounting and finance as well as familiarity in risk management and risk assessment and the application of the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission internal controls framework.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, while serving as a chief financial officer of one of the two public companies noted above, Mr. Anderson had primary responsibility for the supply chain and logistics of that company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Anderson also has in-depth experience in corporate governance matters and is the chairman of the board of a public company as well as a member of the governance committee of one other public company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, Mr. Anderson serves as the chairman of the audit committees of two public companies and as a member of the audit committees of two other public companies, including Grainger.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See "Audit Committee" below for the Board's determination concerning Mr. Anderson's service on more than three public company audit committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: V. Ann Hailey
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: V. Ann Hailey, age 66, spent 10 years with L Brands, Inc. (formerly Limited Brands, Inc.), a retail apparel, personal care and beauty products company, where she served as Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer from 1997 to 2006, as Executive Vice President of Corporate Development from 2006 to 2007 and as a board member from 2001 to 2006.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining L Brands, Ms. Hailey spent 13 years at PepsiCo, Inc. in various leadership positions, including Vice President, Headquarters Finance, Pepsi- Cola Company and Vice President, Finance and Chief Financial Officer of Pepsi-Cola Fountain Beverage and USA Divisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She most recently served from July 2012 to March 2014 as President, Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer of Famous Yard Sale, Inc., an online marketplace for celebrities offering items in a virtual yard sale format, and as Chief Financial Officer of Gilt Groupe, Inc., an Internet retailer of discount luxury goods, from January 2009 until January 2010.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Hailey has also held
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: leadership roles at Pillsbury Company and RJR Nabisco Foods, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Hailey serves as a director of Realogy Holdings Corp., where she chairs its audit committee and is a member of its nominating and corporate governance committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She also serves as a director of TD Ameritrad Holdings, Inc., where she serves on several board committees, including its audit and risk committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She was formerly a director of Avon Products, Inc. from 2008 to 2016, where she served on its audit and finance committees, and the Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland, where she served as the chair of its audit committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Hailey, an independent director, was first elected a director of Grainger in 2006 and is a member of the Audit Committee, an "audit committee financial expert," and a member of the Board Affairs and Nominating Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Qualifications
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Hailey has spent her career in consumer businesses and brings key financial and operations experience to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In particular, Ms. Hailey possesses broad expertise in finance, strategic planning, branding and marketing, retail goods and sales and distribution on a global scale.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Hailey's positions as a former chief financial officer, her current and prior service on the audit committees of other companies and as audit chair of the Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland and her accounting and financial knowledge, also impart significant expertise to the Board, including an understanding of financial statements, corporate finance, accounting and capital markets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Through her experiences at Gilt Groupe Inc. and Famous Yard Sale, Ms. Hailey has added experience in Internet site development and selling as well as new venture management and funding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stuart L. Levenick
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stuart L. Levenick, age 64, is a retired Group President of Caterpillar Inc., a manufacturer of construction and mining equipment, diesel and natural gas engines, and industrial gas turbines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to assuming that position in 2004, Mr. Levenick served as Vice President, Caterpillar Inc., and Chairman of Shin Caterpillar Mitsubishi Ltd. from 2000 to 2004, and as Vice President, Asia Pacific Division, from 2001 to 2004.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is also the Lead Director of Entergy Corporation, where he also chairs its finance committee and is a member of its governance and executive committee, and Finning International Inc., where he is a member of its audit committee and safety, environment and social responsibility committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Levenick, an independent director, was first appointed a director of Grainger in 2005, and is the Lead Director, Chair of the Board Affairs and Nominating Committee and a member of the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Qualifications
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Levenick has served as the president of a division of a public multinational manufacturing company and has had extensive international operations experience including positions outside the United States in numerous countries for more than 20 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Levenick also had operational responsibility for supply chain and logistics and responsibility for the global parts and product support business as well as global marketing of his previous employer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, he had led his former employer's global human resources function and had responsibility for that company's enterprise risk assessment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: D.G. Macpherson
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: D.G. Macpherson, age 49, is Chief Executive Officer of Grainger, a position assumed in October 2016 at which time he was also appointed to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Previously, he served as Chief Operating Officer of Grainger from August 2015 through September 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to these roles, Mr. Macpherson was Senior Vice President and Group President, Global Supply Chain and International, where he led the development of corporate strategy and continuous improvement, the global supply chain organization, the Company's single channel online business model and international operations in Asia and Europe.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to that, Mr. Macpherson was Senior Vice President and President, Global Supply Chain and Corporate Strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Macpherson joined Grainger in 2008 from The Boston Consulting Group, a global management consulting firm, where he was a partner and managing director from 2002 to 2008.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Qualifications
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Macpherson is the Company's Chief Executive Officer and former Chief Operating Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He has served Grainger in many capacities over his nearly 10 years with the Company, including developing Company strategy, overseeing the launch of Grainger's U.S. single channel business, Zoro Tools, Inc., building the Company's supply chain capabilities globally and realigning the U.S. business to create greater value for customers of all sizes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Macpherson also has extensive experience in strategic planning, development and execution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Macpherson joined Grainger in 2008 after working closely with Grainger for six years as a partner and managing director at The Boston Consulting Group, where he was a member of the Industrial Goods Leadership Team.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Neil S. Novich
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Neil S. Novich, age 62, is the former Chairman, President, and Chief Executive Officer and a former director of Ryerson Inc., a major metal distributor and fabricator.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Novich became Ryerson's President and Chief Executive Officer in 1996 and also Chairman in 1999, a position he held through 2007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is also a director of Analog Devices, Inc., where he chairs the compensation committee, Beacon Roofing Supply, Inc., where he chairs the compensation committee and previously chaired the audit committee, and Hillenbrand, Inc., where he chairs the compensation and management development committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is a trustee of The Field Museum of Natural History, and a member of the Visiting Committee to the Physical Sciences Division, University of Chicago.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Novich, an independent director, was first elected a director of Grainger in 1999 and is a member of the Audit Committee, an "audit committee financial expert," and a member of the Board Affairs and Nominating Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Qualifications
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Novich has served as the chief executive officer and chairman of the board of a public multinational metal distributor and fabricator, where he was deeply engaged in that company's distribution operations on a domestic and international basis, and also in the leadership development and human resources functions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He was also a consultant for a management consulting firm for over 10 years developing strategies for its clients.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, Mr. Novich has in-depth operational experience in supply chain, distribution and logistics and experience in developing strategy across a variety of industries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Novich also chairs the compensation committees of three public companies, having previously chaired the audit committee of one of those companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Michael J. Roberts
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Michael J. Roberts, age 66, is the former Global President and Chief Operating Officer of McDonald's Corporation from 2004 to 2006.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: His previous positions at McDonald's Corporation include Chief Executive OfficerMcDonald's USA during 2004; President McDonald's USA from 2001 to 2004; and President, West DivisionMcDonald's USA from 1997 to 2001.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Roberts is also a director of CenturyLink, Inc., where he serves on its compensation committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Roberts previously served on the board of directors of Qwest Communications International, Inc. (prior to its acquisition by CenturyLink) from August 2009 to April 2011, where he served on the compensation and human resources committee, and SP Plus Corporation (formerly, Standard Parking Corporation) from April 2010 to June 2013, where he served on the audit, compensation and executive committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Roberts, an independent director, was first appointed a director of Grainger in 2006 and is Chair of the Compensation Committee and a member of the Board Affairs and Nominating Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Qualifications
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Roberts served as president and chief operating officer of a public multinational food-service company and in this capacity had extensive management and profit and loss responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, he was responsible for the marketing and international operations of that company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Roberts also has significant human resources experience and previously served on the compensation committees of two other public companies and the audit committee of one of those companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: James T. Ryan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: James T. Ryan, age 58, is Grainger's Chairman of the Board, a role he has held since April 2009.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Ryan served as President and Chief Executive Officer of Grainger from June 2008 through September 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He served as Chief Operating Officer from 2007 to 2008 and was appointed to the Board of Directors in February 2007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to these roles, Mr. Ryan served as Group President, responsible for the Company's businesses operating under the Grainger brand in the United States.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He has served Grainger in ncreasingly responsible roles since 1980, including Executive Vice President, Marketing, Sales and Service; President, Grainger.com; Vice President, Information Services; and President, Grainger Parts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Ryan is the Vice Chair of the Board of Trustees of DePaul University, Co-Chair of the Business Advisory Council for the Farmer School of Business at Miami University, Oxford, Ohio, and is a member of the Civic Committee of the Commercial Club of Chicago, the Economic Club of Chicago and the National Association of Wholesaler-Distributors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Qualifications
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Ryan is the Company's former President and Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He has served Grainger in many capacities over his more than 30 years with the Company including direct responsibility for purchasing and varied management roles in the supply chain operations of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Previously, Mr. Ryan was directly responsible for the sales and marketing of Grainger's United States operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Ryan also has extensive experience in strategic planning, development and execution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: E. Scott Santi
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: E. Scott Santi, age 55, is Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Illinois Tool Works Inc. (ITW), a worldwide manufacturer and marketer of engineered components and industrial systems and consumables.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Santi was elected Chief Executive Officer of ITW in November 2012, after serving as acting Chief Executive Officer since October 2012, and was elected Chairman in May of 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Previously, Mr. Santi served as Vice Chairman of ITW from 2008 to 2012, and Executive Vice President from 2004 until 2008.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Santi, an independent director, was first elected a director of Grainger in 2010 and is Chair of the Audit Committee, an "audit committee financial expert," and a member of the Board Affairs and Nominating Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Qualifications
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Santi is the chief executive officer of a public manufacturer and marketer of products.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to assuming this position, he served in various management roles for the same company including positions requiring significant operational and financial responsibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During his tenure he has had extensive international responsibility including operating responsibility for a business with annual international revenues of several billion dollars.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Santi has significant experience with mergers and acquisitions and with integrating acquired companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He has also had significant strategic marketing responsibilities and human resource experience including compensation policy, leadership development and succession planning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: James D. Slavik
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: James D. Slavik, age 64, is Chairman and a director of Mark IV Capital, Inc., a private commercial real estate development and investment company that was founded in 1974.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mark IV Capital acquires, invests in, develops and manages commercial real estate projects.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Slavik was named to his current position in 2003, after serving as Mark IV Capital, Inc.'s Chairman and Chief Executive Officer from 1990 to 2003.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also serves on the Advisory Board for the Cove Fund, a seed capital fund affiliated with UCI Applied Innovation (formerly the Institute for Innovation) at the University of California at Irvine and is a Founding Director for UCI Applied Innovation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Slavik is also a director of the Hoag Hospital Foundation and is a member of its investment and nominating committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Slavik, an independent director, was first elected a director of Grainger in 1987 and is a member of the Board Affairs and Nominating Committee and the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Qualifications
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Slavik is the chairman of a private commercial real estate development and investment company and was previously that company's chief executive officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One of the primary objectives of Grainger's corporate governance structure is to have a highly functional Board that properly oversees Grainger's strategies and operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board's Criteria for Membership on the Board of Directors (Criteria) list the various characteristics that the Board Affairs and Nominating Committee should consider in reviewing candidates for the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to relevant business experience, qualifications, attributes, skills, and the willingness to become involved with Grainger, the Criteria also enumerate personal characteristics that should be considered, including reputation for ethics and integrity, common sense and judgment, independent and objective thought, and the consideration of diverse opinions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Regarding diversity, the Criteria specify that consideration shall be given to candidates without regard to race, color, religion, gender or national origin.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To ensure that the Board benefits from diverse perspectives, it seeks qualified nominees from a variety of backgrounds, including candidates of gender and racia diversity, and in any retained search for Board candidates, Grainger specifies that the Board is seeking candidates with gender and racial diversity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board actively reviews diversity recruiting efforts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lead Director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Operating Principles for the Board of Directors and Grainger's by-laws created the leadership position of Lead Director, to be elected annually by and from the Board's independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Stuart L. Levenick was appointed to serve as Lead Director after the April 2016 annual meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee of the Board (the Audit Committee) met six times in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that each of the members of the Audit Committee is "independent," as that term is defined in the independence requirements for audit committee members contained in the applicable rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and listing standards of the NYSE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has also determined that each of Mr. Santi, Chair of the Audit Committee, Mr. Anderson, Mr. Novich, and Ms. Hailey, is an "audit committee financial expert," as that term is defined in the applicable rules of the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, in accordance with applicable NYSE listing standards, the Board has considered Mr. Anderson's simultaneous service on the audit committees of more than three public companies, namely the audit committees of Grainger, PulteGroup Inc., James Hardie Industries plc, and Stericycle, Inc., and has determined that such service will not impair his ability to serve effectively on the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee assists the Board in its oversight responsibility with respect to Grainger's financial reporting process, Grainger's systems of internal accounting and financial controls, the integrity of Grainger's financial statements, Grainger's compliance with legal and regulatory requirements, the qualifications and independence of Grainger's independent auditor, and the performance of Grainger's internal audit function and independent auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It also has oversight responsibilities for various aspects of certain employee benefit plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally included among the responsibilities of the Audit Committee are the appointment, compensation, retention, and oversight of the independent auditor; the establishment of procedures for the treatment of complaints egarding accounting, internal accounting controls, and auditing matters; and the pre-approval of audit and non-audit services to be provided by the ndependent auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has the further responsibility to review Grainger's risk assessment and risk management process and policies and o oversee compliance with Grainger's Business Conduct Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Affairs and Nominating Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board Affairs and Nominating Committee of the Board (the Board Affairs and Nominating Committee) met five times in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that each of the members of the Board Affairs and Nominating Committee is "independent," as that term is defined in the independence requirements for members of nominating committees contained in the applicable standards of the NYSE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board Affairs and Nominating Committee makes recommendations to the Board regarding the makeup of the Board and its committees, establishes specific criteria by which potential directors shall be qualified, identifies potential nominees, makes recommendations concerning director and nominee ndependence, reviews transactions between Grainger and related persons (as further discussed below), and evaluates the overall performance of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It also has primary oversight responsibility for corporate governance, including the responsibility to recommend corporate governance principles, recommend Board committee responsibilities and members, evaluate the Board in the area of corporate governance, including the adequacy of the information supplied to the Board and the Board's performance of its oversight responsibilities relative to the management of Grainger, and to recommend retirement, compensation, and other policies applicable to directors; and oversight
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
